Perfume.name: Hustle Night Eau de Toilette
Perfume.manufactured: Golden ABC, Inc, Metro Manila, Philippines

Perfume.name: Lovestory Eau De Toilette
Perfume.manufactured: Golden ABC, Inc, Metro Manila, Philippines
Perfume.productDescription: Fall in love with the perfect pair of long-lasting scents

Perfume.name: versace eros
Perfume.productDescription: The new perfume Eros is the first in the past five years to be launched and aimed at men. Donatella Versace's desire was to fit the fragrance into the concept of theVersace brand and to depict style and significance of long-lasting design

Perfume.name: SAUVAGE EAU DE TOILETTE
Perfume.manufactured: Dior factory in Saint Jean de Braye in France
Perfume.productDescription: A radically fresh composition, Sauvage is both raw and noble. Radiant top notes burst with the juicy freshness of Calabrian bergamot, while amberwood unleashes a powerfully woody trail

Perfume.name: Pumped Blue Eau De Toilette
Perfume.manufactured: Golden ABC, Inc, Metro Manila, Philippines
Perfume.productDescription: The scent opens with Bergamot, Citrus, Green, Ozone, and Aldehyde notes with Floral, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmin, and Rosewood notes, bathed by the fragrance of Wood, Cedarwood, Animal, Musk, and Amber.
